data.sampled: An 'increase' in stock price would be more optimal for the given position. The current stock price of $74.21 is lower than the maximum potential profit of $1.79 from the $87 strike call if the price rises to $92, but higher than the potential loss from the $72 strike put if the stock price rises to $77. Therefore, it is more optimal to increase the stock price. (E.g. sell the $72 strike put at $0.84 instead of buying the $92 strike call at $1.88).
